name: Romeo Power, Inc.
description: Romeo Power, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced energy solutions specializing in battery technology for electric vehicles (EVs) and energy storage systems. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, the company is committed to accelerating the adoption of sustainable energy through its innovative products. Romeo Power designs and manufactures high-performance battery packs that are tailored for commercial vehicle applications, including electric trucks, buses, and other heavy-duty vehicles. The company focuses on producing energy-dense, long-lasting, and efficient battery systems that enhance the performance and reliability of electric fleets. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Romeo Power is at the forefront of battery technology advancements, including thermal management systems and integrated battery management systems. The company aims to reduce the total cost of ownership for its customers while contributing to a cleaner environment by promoting electric transportation solutions. Romeo Power's mission is to power the future of transportation and energy with cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices.
